sentences.sentence: Objective to evaluate the effects of reformatory PFM in clinic.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨改良式烤瓷冠的临床应用效果。

sentences.sentence: It was during the decade when the Paraguay economy was weak and the reformatory was out of budget.
sentences.translation: 十年正值巴拉圭经济疲弱，感化院经费拮据、资源短缺。
